participant_1.background:
I rode horses in the snow with my friends last winter.
i am never still.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
I used to be a carpenter but I got tired of the long hours.
i am a cheerleader.

participant_2.background:
I work long hours and play basketball to relieve stress.
I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
i believe that mermaids are real.
I love my fiance and I can't wait to start our life together.
i have two brothers.

content.text: Hi! That sounds fun! What do you like most about it?
I love the teamwork and the challenge, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
That’s interesting, I’ve never met a cheerleader who plays the flute!
I used to be a carpenter, but I got tired of the long hours.
Oh wow, that’s a big change! What made you decide to switch?
I wanted to do something more creative and I love the challenge of a good fight, so I became a cheerleader.
That’s awesome! I’m glad you found something you love.
Thanks! Do you have any hobbies?
I work long hours, but I play basketball to relieve stress. I also love to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
That sounds nice. I love being outdoors too.
Me too! I also love my fiancé and I can’t wait to start our life together.
Thanks! So, what’s next for you?
I’m not sure yet. I’m just enjoying my time as a cheerleader and taking it one day at a time
